languages.text: {n}Рубиновые глаза Кассии округляются, а белоснежное лицо заливает румянец.{/n} "Мы не... Я не... Это наше личное дело — только мое и леди Джай. Прошу, оставьте, Лорд-капитан. Мы уже давно примирились. И, к вашему сведению, никто мне не угрожал. Ваша информация ошибочна".

traits.locale_text: {n}Рубиновые глаза Кассии округляются, а белоснежное лицо заливает румянец.{/n} "Мы не... Я не... Это наше личное дело — только мое и леди Джай. Прошу, оставьте, Вольный Торговец. Мы уже давно примирились. И, к вашему сведению, никто мне не угрожал. Ваша информация ошибочна".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia's ruby eyes become round and an unbidden flush suffuses her pale face with a rosy tint.{/n} "We didn't... I didn't... That is our private business — the issue was between me and Lady Jae. Lord Captain, please pay it no heed. We made our peace long ago. And I will have you know — no one threatened me. Your information is incorrect."
languages.original_text: {n}Рубиновые глаза Кассии округляются, а белоснежное лицо заливает румянец.{/n} "Мы не... Я не... Это наше личное дело — только мое и леди Джай. Прошу, оставьте, Лорд-капитан. Мы уже давно примирились. И, к вашему сведению, никто мне не угрожал. Ваша информация ошибочна".

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅红宝石般的眼睛瞪得圆圆的。她苍白的脸上不由自主地泛起了红晕，脸颊染上了玫瑰般的色彩。{/n}“我们并没有……我并没有……这是我们之间的私事，只是我与婕伊女士两人之间的问题。请不要在意，舰长大人。我们很久之前就和解了。而且我想让你知道，从来没有人威胁过我，你听到的信息并不准确。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's ruby eyes become round and an unbidden flush suffuses her pale face with a rosy tint.{/n} "We didn't... I didn't... That is our private business — the issue was between me and Lady Jae. Lord Captain, please pay it no heed. We made our peace long ago. And I will have you know — no one threatened me. Your information is incorrect."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅红宝石般的眼睛瞪得圆圆的。她苍白的脸上不由自主地泛起了红晕，脸颊染上了玫瑰般的色彩。{/n}“我们并没有……我并没有……这是我们之间的私事，只是我与婕伊女士两人之间的问题。请不要在意，舰长大人。我们很久之前就和解了。而且我想让你知道，从来没有人威胁过我，你听到的信息并不准确。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de rubí de Cassia se abren de par en par y su pálida tez se sonroja al instante.{/n} «Pero si no... no hice... Es un asunto privado entre lady Jae y yo, Lord Capitán, no haga caso a esas cosas. Hicimos las paces hace mucho. Y para que quede claro, nadie me amenazó. Su información no es correcta».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's ruby eyes become round and an unbidden flush suffuses her pale face with a rosy tint.{/n} "We didn't... I didn't... That is our private business — the issue was between me and Lady Jae. Lord Captain, please pay it no heed. We made our peace long ago. And I will have you know — no one threatened me. Your information is incorrect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de rubí de Cassia se abren de par en par y su pálida tez se sonroja al instante.{/n} «Pero si no... no hice... Es un asunto privado entre lady Jae y yo, Lord Capitán, no haga caso a esas cosas. Hicimos las paces hace mucho. Y para que quede claro, nadie me amenazó. Su información no es correcta».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアのルビー色の瞳が丸くなり、紅潮が彼女の青白い顔を薔薇色に染める。{/n}「あたくしたちは…あたくしは…それはあたくしたちの…ジェイさんとの間の個人的な問題です。ロード・キャプテン、どうかお気になさらないでください。あたくしたちはずっと前に和解しました。誰もあたくしを脅したりしていません。あなた様の情報は間違っております」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's ruby eyes become round and an unbidden flush suffuses her pale face with a rosy tint.{/n} "We didn't... I didn't... That is our private business — the issue was between me and Lady Jae. Lord Captain, please pay it no heed. We made our peace long ago. And I will have you know — no one threatened me. Your information is incorrect."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアのルビー色の瞳が丸くなり、紅潮が彼女の青白い顔を薔薇色に染める。{/n}「あたくしたちは…あたくしは…それはあたくしたちの…ジェイさんとの間の個人的な問題です。ロード・キャプテン、どうかお気になさらないでください。あたくしたちはずっと前に和解しました。誰もあたくしを脅したりしていません。あなた様の情報は間違っております」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassias Rubinaugen werden rund, und ihr blasses Gesicht nimmt ungeplant einen rosa Farbton an.{/n} "Wir hatten keinen ... Ich hatte keinen ... Das ist unsere Privatangelegenheit – eine Sache zwischen mir und Lady Jae. Lord Captain, bitte achtet nicht darauf. Wir haben längst Frieden geschlossen. Und damit Ihr es wisst – niemand hat mich bedroht. Eure Informationen sind nicht korrekt."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's ruby eyes become round and an unbidden flush suffuses her pale face with a rosy tint.{/n} "We didn't... I didn't... That is our private business — the issue was between me and Lady Jae. Lord Captain, please pay it no heed. We made our peace long ago. And I will have you know — no one threatened me. Your information is incorrect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassias Rubinaugen werden rund, und ihr blasses Gesicht nimmt ungeplant einen rosa Farbton an.{/n} "Wir hatten keinen ... Ich hatte keinen ... Das ist unsere Privatangelegenheit – eine Sache zwischen mir und Lady Jae. Lord Captain, bitte achtet nicht darauf. Wir haben längst Frieden geschlossen. Und damit Ihr es wisst – niemand hat mich bedroht. Eure Informationen sind nicht korrekt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia écarquille les yeux, subitement rouge comme une pivoine.{/n} « Nous n'avons pas... Je n'ai pas... Enfin, cette affaire ne regarde que nous, dame Jae et moi. N'y prêtez pas attention, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Voilà bien longtemps que nous nous sommes réconciliées. Pour votre gouverne, sachez également que vos informations sont erronées : personne ne m'a menacée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's ruby eyes become round and an unbidden flush suffuses her pale face with a rosy tint.{/n} "We didn't... I didn't... That is our private business — the issue was between me and Lady Jae. Lord Captain, please pay it no heed. We made our peace long ago. And I will have you know — no one threatened me. Your information is incorrect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia écarquille les yeux, subitement rouge comme une pivoine.{/n} « Nous n'avons pas... Je n'ai pas... Enfin, cette affaire ne regarde que nous, dame Jae et moi. N'y prêtez pas attention, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Voilà bien longtemps que nous nous sommes réconciliées. Pour votre gouverne, sachez également que vos informations sont erronées : personne ne m'a menacée. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın yakut gözleri büyüyor; solgun yüzüne aniden hücum eden kızarıklık, tenine güle benzer bir ton kazandırıyor.{/n} "Biz. Ben. Bu bizim kişisel meselemiz. Bu konu, ben ve Leydi Jae arasında. Kafana takmayasın Lord Kaptan. Aramız uzun zaman önce düzeldi. Ayrıca beni kimse tehdit etmedi. Edindiğin bilgi yanlış."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's ruby eyes become round and an unbidden flush suffuses her pale face with a rosy tint.{/n} "We didn't... I didn't... That is our private business — the issue was between me and Lady Jae. Lord Captain, please pay it no heed. We made our peace long ago. And I will have you know — no one threatened me. Your information is incorrect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia'nın yakut gözleri büyüyor ve solgun yüzüne aniden hücum eden kızarıklık, tenine güle benzer bir ton kazandırıyor.{/n} "Biz. Ben. Bu bizim kişisel meselemiz. Bu konu ben ve Leydi Jae arasında. Lütfen kafana takma Lord Kaptan. Aramız uzun zaman önce düzeldi. Ayrıca beni kimse tehdit etmedi. Edindiğin bilgi yanlış."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
